problems.q: A soccer coach has 9 cones for each practice station. There are 5 stations. How many cones are needed?
A baker made 312 cookies. She gave 129 cookies to a school event. How many cookies are left?
A dragon has 72 marshmallows and puts them into bags of 8. How many bags can the dragon fill?
A dinosaur museum has 144 dinosaur stickers. It gives away 58 stickers. How many stickers are left?
A robot has 99 bolts and uses 11 bolts to build one gadget. How many gadgets can the robot build?
A dragon collected 235 shiny rocks. Later it collected 118 more shiny rocks. How many shiny rocks does the dragon have?
A treasure map is cut into 9 equal pieces. If there are 63 pieces in total, how many maps were cut?
A pet shop has 6 fish tanks. Each tank has 12 fish. How many fish are there in all the tanks?
A farmer picked 198 apples. He sold 74 apples at the market. How many apples does he have left?
A baker has 144 mini-muffins and puts 12 mini-muffins in each tray. How many trays can be filled?
At the zoo, 268 visitors came in the morning and 175 visitors came in the afternoon. How many visitors came to the zoo in total?
A zoo keeper feeds 4 bananas to each monkey. There are 12 monkeys. How many bananas are needed?
A classroom has 126 crayons. Another class donates 79 crayons. How many crayons are there now?
A skateboard shop has 54 wheels and each skateboard needs 4 wheels. How many complete skateboards can be made?
A kid has 219 comic books. She donates 103 comic books. How many comic books does she have now?
A superhero shares 84 stickers equally among 7 friends. How many stickers does each friend get?
A toy store has 420 balloons. After a party, 287 balloons were used. How many balloons are still in the store?
A game arcade gives 7 tickets each time you win. If you win 11 times, how many tickets do you get?
A magician had 275 cards. During practice, 89 cards got bent and were removed. How many cards are still good?
A movie theater has 120 seats and fills them in 10 equal rows. How many seats are in each row?
A spaceship has 300 fuel pods. It uses 146 fuel pods on a trip. How many fuel pods are left?
A gardener plants 66 flowers in 6 equal rows. How many flowers are in each row?
A chef puts 10 blueberries on each pancake. If she makes 6 pancakes, how many blueberries does she use?
A robot built 156 mini-robots on Monday and 207 mini-robots on Tuesday. How many mini-robots did it build altogether?
A party host has 108 glow sticks and gives 9 glow sticks to each guest. How many guests can get glow sticks?
A pirate has 147 gold coins and finds 86 more in a treasure chest. How many gold coins does the pirate have now?
A comic artist draws 11 stars on each page. She draws 7 pages. How many stars does she draw?
A candy machine drops 12 candies each time it is used. If it is used 8 times, how many candies drop?
A wizard is packing spell books. There are 8 boxes and each box holds 9 books. How many spell books are packed?
A teacher has 96 pencils and puts them into packs of 12. How many packs can she make?
